readable.title: 3217240672_b99a682026
readable.content: A group of people ride down the road in a large tractor . A tractor decorated as a float for a parade A tractor pulling a wagon with a giant pumpkin covered in cloth and two wicker baskers on it drives down a road with people nearby . Several people ride in a very odd looking truck . Three men are driving a tractor that is carrying a huge brown object .
